title: Alert
description: Displays a form alert or a component that looks like a alert.

body.raw: ## alert Displays a form alert field or a component that looks like an alert field. ### Installation CLI Manual ```bash npx shadcn@latest add "https://designali.in/r/styles/default/alert" ``` Copy and paste the following code into your project. Update the import paths to match your project setup. ### Props | Prop | Type | Description | Default | | ---- | ---- | ----------- | ------- |
